name: i-m-technologies.
overview:
Link Building Company Offering High Quality Contextual Links at an Affordable Price

I-M-Technologies, a thriving internet marketing company has been providing high quality link building service to its clients all over the world for some years now. Our expert link building team has been successful in satisfying all our customers till date by providing proficient link building service using tried and tested link building methods. We constantly upgrade our service by updating ourselves with new SEO techniques. This month we are promoting our updated link building package at affordable price.

A sample package has been chalked out below for you to get a clear idea of how our link building campaign works.

Package Details: Complete link building plan - Sample Package

  1. Permanent One Way links From Relevant Websites: 5 pr 1+ permanent links from relevant websites.
  2. One way Links From High PR Directories: 10 standard directory links from popular directories. All directories are of minimum Pr 3.
  3. Relevant Forum Links: 5*2 do-follow forum links from relevant forums or threads. All forums will be relevant to your topic.
  4. In-content Comment Links From High PR Pages: 5 PR 2 or 2+ comment links. No spammy pages or comments will be provided. Outbound links will be limited to 50.
  5. Blog Posts (250 to 300 word article): 1 unique blog post will be written and posted. Each blog will have minimum pr of 2.
  6. Article Creation: 1 Keyword optimized, fresh article will be written. Article will only be syndicated after your approval. It will be unique and written by our expert writers.
  7. Guaranteed Article Syndication: Article will be syndicated to 10 most popular article directories including ezinearticles.com.
  8. Press Release Writing: In this sample package we do not provide any press release but if you can provide one then we will be syndicating it through popular channels.
  9. Guaranteed Press Release Publication: 20 guaranteed approval from most popular PR sites.
  10. Social Bookmarking: Each article, press release and blog post will be social bookmarked (2 each). Total 75 SBM.
  11. Web 2.0 Properties: 1 fresh blog will be created on web 2.0 platforms. Each one will be updated for at least once with unique and fresh content. Each one will be customized by our designing team to make it look unique. Price: $95/per package

Benefit of choosing this package: In our package we stress the factor of link optimization. Therefore you can be sure of the fact that your <a href="http://www.i-m-technologies.com/complete-link-building-service.html">link building campaign</a> won’t be based on some random links collected from any site. If you want your business to boom then you need higher online visibility, along with an increase in target traffic rate. Our link building package can ensure both along with offering additional benefits. These are as followed-

     1) our link building package provides you with quality links from all over the web so your site would get high online exposure, which is essential for growth of your business. 
     2) This also helps you to get huge amount of inward traffic. 
     3) leading search engines highly value content oriented links. In our package we provide you with high quality content centric links, through article, press release creation and blog posting. 
      4) our sample package makes  it is clear that we employ diverse techniques  to collect wide range of  links for you; as a result your site starts to rank high on SERP. 
      5) our link building package is extremely flexible. In case you do not like any link, then we will remove that link and replace it with link of your choice.

Why you should choose us- Our link building team only uses most effective techniques of link building ,keeping requirement of our client in mind. We constantly update our knowledge by keeping track of new evolving techniques in the SEO field. Also our service is extremely flexible, you have the freedom to choose your links, also we will remove and replace any link if you don’t like it. Our price range is affordable too.

<a href="http://www.i-m-technologies.com/">I-M-Technologies</a> stands for quality and efficient service. We have been serving clients from different parts of the world with our expertise. Along with link building our service also includes web designing, and internet marketing. Try out our sample package today; we can assure you that our link building package would give your business a significant boost, by bettering your online visibility, increasing your organic traffic, and at the same time increasing ranking of your site on SERP.

To know more about our complete link building packages feel free to visit our <a href="http://www.i-m-technologies.com/complete-link-building-service.html">complete link building package</a> section.

If you have any queries or want to talk to our sales executive please let us know by sending an email at sales[@]i-m-technologies[.]com.
